CRUK-CI Genologics API Recorder 2.27.4 API

This project is record and playback wrappers for the Cambridge Research UK Cambridge Institute (CRUK-CI) Java client for Genologics' REST API.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.cruk.genologics.api.playback
The classes necessary to replay server calls from entity XML files on disk.
org.cruk.genologics.api.record
The classes necessary to record entities returned from a Clarity server to XML files on disk.
org.cruk.genologics.api.search
Classes supporting the recording of searches for record and playback.
org.cruk.genologics.api.xstream
Classes supporting the secured newer versions of XStream, used to record searches and their results.

This project is record and playback wrappers for the Cambridge Research UK Cambridge Institute (CRUK-CI) Java client for Genologics' REST API.

It provides a means of recording Clarity API server messages to files, which can then be used to provide a replay of those messages from the files. This allows unit tests to be written that have real data but don't change over time and can be run without access to the original server.

To use the record and playback wrappers, create a Spring application context including the main client's file org/cruk/genologics/api/genologics-client-context.xml plus either org/cruk/genologics/api/genologics-record-context.xml for recording or org/cruk/genologics/api/genologics-playback-context.xml for playback.

Author:
Richard Bowers (richard.bowers@cruk.cam.ac.uk)
See Also:
